speech: (Oolong should ask him some warmup questions first, so he doesn't get suspicious.)
speaker: Oolong

speech: "Oh, hey Oolong. I didn't see you there."
speaker: Plague Knight

speech: "You smart scientist, right? Oolong have some questions."
speaker: Oolong

directions.speech: "It has to do with the scattering of light in the atmosphere."
directions.speaker: Plague Knight

directions.speech: "Blue light scatters the most, so it's the most visible."
directions.speaker: Plague Knight

directions.speech: "So our planet is actually rotating in space."
directions.speaker: Plague Knight

directions.speech: "When the portion that we're on turns away from the sun, the sun appears to sink beneath the horizon."
directions.speaker: Plague Knight

directions.speech: "And then in the morning, it appears to rise as we turn to face it again."
directions.speaker: Plague Knight

choices.text: Why do leaves change color in fall?

directions.speech: "Leaves are green because they contain chlorophyll, which makes food out of the sun."
directions.speaker: Plague Knight

directions.speech: "But in the winter there's not enough sunlight for chlorophyll to be efficient."
directions.speaker: Plague Knight

directions.speech: "What trees do to save energy is let the chlorophyll in their leaves break down, causing them to stop being green and then fall off."
directions.speaker: Plague Knight

directions.speech: "That way the tree can hibernate during winter, and then grow new leaves in the spring."
directions.speaker: Plague Knight

directions.speech: "Well a word is something defined in the dictionary."
directions.speaker: Plague Knight

directions.speech: "Wait no, because then how could new words be added to the dictionary?"
directions.speaker: Plague Knight

directions.speech: "I guess a word can just be anything then?"
directions.speaker: Plague Knight

directions.speech: "Um, it has something to do with air resistance I think."
directions.speaker: Plague Knight

directions.speech: "I don't know, my preferred method of flight is combustion."
directions.speaker: Plague Knight

directions.speech: "Oh, this is a fun one!"
directions.speaker: Plague Knight

directions.speech: "Thioacetone is composed of three carbon, six hydrogen, and a single sulfur."
directions.speaker: Plague Knight

directions.speech: "The scent is putrid enough to cause the evacuation of an entire hamlet, hee hee!"
directions.speaker: Plague Knight

speech: "Great, but Oolong need to know even more."
speaker: Oolong

directions.speech: "Trivago."
directions.speaker: Plague Knight

directions.speech: "Probably Polar Knight. Who else brings dogs to a party?"
directions.speaker: Plague Knight

choices.text: Why Oolong's dad not come back?

directions.speech: "Uh, that really isn't a question for me to answer."
directions.speaker: Plague Knight

directions.speech: "It trick question! Oolong's father is dead!"
directions.speaker: Oolong

speech: "Well, Oolong hear about love but he not know what it means."
speaker: Oolong

speech: "The brain is controlled via a series of chemicals and electrical impulses. The relevant chemical for our discussion is dopamine."
speaker: Plague Knight

speech: "Dopamine's primary effect is to create feelings of satisfaction. When one is "in love," the brain releases extra dopamine."
speaker: Plague Knight

speech: "Thus beings of higher cognitive function are still driven to reproduce."
speaker: Plague Knight

speech: "You know how you enjoy spending time with your friends, right?"
speaker: Plague Knight

speech: "Now imagine that, but ten times better."
speaker: Plague Knight

speech: "In that case, there just one more thing Oolong need to know."
speaker: Oolong

speech: "Oh sorry Oolong, I have to get to class now."
speaker: Plague Knight

speech: "Now Oolong really want to be super-friends with him."
speaker: Oolong

speech: "Oolong will have to do it tomorrow in class."
speaker: Oolong
